1599830.name: TOXA : Mystical Cloning Powers
1599830.description:
A cinematic journey of magic, myth, and betrayal awaits.

In a world where the boundaries between gods and mortals blur, ancient prophecies whisper of a fallen guardian whose light once kept chaos at bay. The skies have grown silent, and the celestial realms now tremble under the shadow of a witch’s dark ambition. Every moment is painted in sweeping landscapes, haunting melodies, and the lingering echo of a forgotten war between creation and corruption.  

Once a guardian of the skies, you awaken on Earth—your memories fractured, your power stolen. The witch’s dark cloning magic has left echoes of yourself scattered across the world, each holding fragments of who you once were. To reclaim your strength, you must harness the art of cloning not as a curse, but as a weapon. Explore ancient ruins, gather lost crystals of divine energy, and uncover the truth behind the witch’s betrayal. Every encounter, every shadow, every reflection holds a secret waiting to be revealed.

The fate of the floating Land of the Gods rests in your hands. As you confront destiny itself, the line between hero and monster blurs. Engage in fast-paced, strategic action that tests your reflexes and your resolve, blending mythic storytelling with innovative gameplay. The journey will demand sacrifice, cunning, and heart—but through the storm of memory and magic, the skies may yet remember your name.
1599830.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
